name: Patient Visit - Additional Information
description: The Patient Visit - Additional Information segment (PV2) contains additional information about the patient visit that extends the basic visit data in PV1. This segment includes detailed insurance information, referring provider data, visit history, patient classification details, and administrative information essential for comprehensive patient visit management and billing workflows.

cardinality.note: PV2 provides additional visit details when available

PV2.1.name: Prior Pending Location
PV2.1.description: This field contains the location where the patient was pending prior to being assigned to the current location.

PV2.2.name: Accommodation Code
PV2.2.description: This field contains the accommodation code that identifies the type of accommodation provided to the patient.
PV2.2.generationHint: Room type accommodation for billing and planning purposes

PV2.3.name: Admit Reason
PV2.3.description: This field contains the reason for the patient's admission using coded values.
PV2.3.generationHint: Coded reason for admission - impacts billing and care planning

PV2.4.name: Transfer Reason
PV2.4.description: This field contains the reason for transferring the patient to another location or facility.
PV2.4.generationHint: Transfer reasoning for continuity of care documentation

PV2.5.name: Patient Valuables
PV2.5.description: This field indicates what valuables the patient has and their location during the visit.
PV2.5.generationHint: List of patient valuables: jewelry, money, electronics, etc.

PV2.6.name: Patient Valuables Location
PV2.6.description: This field identifies where the patient's valuables are stored during the visit.
PV2.6.generationHint: Storage location: hospital safe, bedside, with family, etc.

PV2.7.name: Visit User Code
PV2.7.description: This field contains user-defined codes to categorize the visit for reporting or tracking purposes.
PV2.7.generationHint: Local codes for visit categorization and tracking

PV2.8.name: Expected Admit Date/Time
PV2.8.description: This field contains the expected date and time of admission when the visit is scheduled in advance.
PV2.8.generationHint: Scheduled admission time for elective procedures and admissions

PV2.9.name: Expected Discharge Date/Time
PV2.9.description: This field contains the expected date and time of discharge for planning purposes.
PV2.9.generationHint: Estimated discharge time for care planning and resource allocation

PV2.10.name: Estimated Length of Inpatient Stay
PV2.10.description: This field contains the estimated number of days for the inpatient stay.
PV2.10.generationHint: Length of stay in days: 1-999, used for capacity planning

PV2.11.name: Actual Length of Inpatient Stay
PV2.11.description: This field contains the actual number of days the patient stayed as an inpatient.
PV2.11.generationHint: Actual length of stay for billing and outcome tracking

PV2.12.name: Visit Description
PV2.12.description: This field contains a free text description of the visit or special circumstances.
PV2.12.generationHint: Free text visit description and special circumstances

PV2.13.name: Referral Source Code
PV2.13.description: This field identifies the source of the referral for this visit using coded values.

PV2.14.name: Previous Service Date
PV2.14.description: This field contains the date of the patient's previous service at this facility.
PV2.14.generationHint: Date of last visit for continuity tracking

PV2.15.name: Employment Illness Related Indicator
PV2.15.description: This field indicates whether the illness or injury is related to the patient's employment.
PV2.15.generationHint: Workers compensation and occupational health indicator

PV2.16.name: Purge Status Code
PV2.16.description: This field indicates the purge status of the visit record for data retention management.

validValues.description: The visit is marked for deletion
The visit is included in purge

PV2.17.name: Purge Status Date
PV2.17.description: This field contains the date when the purge status was last changed.
PV2.17.generationHint: Date of last purge status change for audit trail

PV2.18.name: Special Program Code
PV2.18.description: This field identifies special programs the patient is enrolled in during this visit.
PV2.18.generationHint: Special program participation for billing and reporting

PV2.19.name: Retention Indicator
PV2.19.description: This field indicates whether the visit record should be retained beyond normal purge cycles.
PV2.19.generationHint: Legal hold or special retention requirements

PV2.20.name: Expected Number of Insurance Plans
PV2.20.description: This field contains the expected number of insurance plans that will be billed for this visit.
PV2.20.generationHint: Number of insurance plans: 1-9, for billing coordination

PV2.21.name: Visit Publicity Code
PV2.21.description: This field indicates the level of publicity or confidentiality required for this visit.
PV2.21.generationHint: Privacy level for VIP patients or sensitive cases

PV2.22.name: Visit Protection Indicator
PV2.22.description: This field indicates whether the patient requires special protection during this visit.
PV2.22.generationHint: Security protection indicator for high-risk patients

PV2.23.name: Clinic Organization Name
PV2.23.description: This field contains the name of the clinic or organization providing services during this visit.
PV2.23.generationHint: Organization providing care: hospital name, clinic name, etc.

PV2.24.name: Patient Status Code
PV2.24.description: This field contains additional patient status information beyond the basic status in PV1.
PV2.24.generationHint: Detailed patient status for administrative tracking

PV2.25.name: Visit Priority Code
PV2.25.description: This field indicates the priority level assigned to this visit for scheduling and resource allocation.
PV2.25.generationHint: Priority level for resource allocation and scheduling

PV2.26.name: Previous Treatment Date
PV2.26.description: This field contains the date of the patient's previous treatment at this or another facility.
PV2.26.generationHint: Date of last treatment for clinical continuity

PV2.27.name: Expected Discharge Disposition
PV2.27.description: This field indicates the expected disposition of the patient at discharge.

validValues.description: Discharged to home or self care
Discharged/transferred to short term general hospital
Discharged/transferred to another type of institution
Discharged/transferred to home under care of organized home health service

PV2.27.generationHint: Expected discharge destination for care planning

PV2.28.name: Signature on File Date
PV2.28.description: This field contains the date when required signatures were obtained and filed.
PV2.28.generationHint: Date signatures obtained for consent and financial responsibility

PV2.29.name: First Similar Illness Date
PV2.29.description: This field contains the date when the patient first experienced a similar illness or condition.
PV2.29.generationHint: Date of first similar illness episode for clinical history

PV2.30.name: Patient Charge Adjustment Code
PV2.30.description: This field contains codes indicating adjustments to patient charges for this visit.
PV2.30.generationHint: Billing adjustments and discounts applied to visit charges

PV2.31.name: Recurring Service Code
PV2.31.description: This field indicates whether this visit is part of a recurring service pattern.
PV2.31.generationHint: Recurring service pattern for ongoing care coordination

PV2.32.name: Billing Media Code
PV2.32.description: This field indicates the preferred method for billing communication.

PV2.33.name: Expected Surgery Date and Time
PV2.33.description: This field contains the expected date and time of surgery when the visit includes a surgical procedure.
PV2.33.generationHint: Scheduled surgery date and time for operative visits

PV2.34.name: Military Partnership Code
PV2.34.description: This field indicates military service affiliation that may affect billing or care.
PV2.34.generationHint: Military service indicator for benefits and billing

PV2.35.name: Military Non-Availability Code
PV2.35.description: This field indicates whether military healthcare services are not available, requiring civilian care.
PV2.35.generationHint: Military care availability for TRICARE and military dependents

PV2.36.name: Newborn Baby Indicator
PV2.36.description: This field indicates whether the patient is a newborn baby requiring special processing.
PV2.36.generationHint: Newborn status for pediatric care protocols and billing

PV2.37.name: Baby Detained Indicator
PV2.37.description: This field indicates whether a newborn baby is being detained due to unpaid bills or other issues.
PV2.37.generationHint: Newborn detention status for administrative and legal tracking

PV2.38.name: Mode of Arrival Code
PV2.38.description: This field indicates how the patient arrived at the healthcare facility.
PV2.38.generationHint: Arrival method impacts triage and emergency department protocols

PV2.39.name: Recreational Drug Use Code
PV2.39.description: This field indicates the patient's recreational drug use status relevant to care and treatment.
PV2.39.generationHint: Drug use history for clinical assessment and treatment planning

PV2.40.name: Admission Level of Care Code
PV2.40.description: This field indicates the level of care required at admission for resource planning.
PV2.40.generationHint: Care level for resource allocation and staffing

PV2.41.name: Treatment Completion Code
PV2.41.description: This field indicates the completion status of the prescribed treatment during this visit.
PV2.41.generationHint: Treatment completion status for clinical outcomes tracking

PV2.42.name: Triage Code
PV2.42.description: This field contains the triage code assigned to the patient upon arrival, typically in emergency settings.
PV2.42.generationHint: Emergency triage level for priority and resource allocation

PV2.43.name: Triage Time
PV2.43.description: This field contains the date and time when the patient was triaged.
PV2.43.generationHint: Triage timestamp for emergency department workflow tracking

PV2.44.name: Originating Referral Identifier
PV2.44.description: This field contains the identifier of the original referral that led to this visit.
PV2.44.generationHint: Original referral tracking for care coordination and billing

PV2.45.name: Body Site Code
PV2.45.description: This field indicates the primary body site or system involved in this visit.
PV2.45.generationHint: Primary anatomical focus for clinical classification

PV2.46.name: Patient Status Effective Date
PV2.46.description: This field contains the effective date of the current patient status.
PV2.46.generationHint: Effective date of current status for tracking status changes
